  • #1 Blockchain developer
      Job Description
      We are looking for passionate Blockchain developers who can work on one of the top PoS networks. To contribute to blockchain's core concepts like consensus, governance, and p2p. Good understanding of protocols and implementation details. Strong knowledge of Go lang is required. Any open-source contributions are a plus.

      Prerequsite Requirment
      • Minimum 4 years of software development and infrastructure architecture experience.
      • Experience in leading blockchain development teams, open source technologies.
      • Good knowledge of Cosmos SDK.
      • Hands-on experience developing proof-of-concept and pilots in at least one of the blockchain platforms such as Ethereum.
      • Hands-on experience in using any of the following Node.js, GoLang.
      • Solid understanding of the practical application of agile development methods in an Agile/Lean/Continuous Delivery environment.
      • Understanding of the issues businesses face and experience working with them to create robust, scalable, elegant, flexible and relevant software solutions that truly transform industries.
      • Knowledge of CI/CD is a plus.

      Your role entitle
      • Work effectively with cross-functional teams including product management to translate requirements to code, with test teams to troubleshoot, isolate issues and provide root cause, ensuring that the software developed is of the highest quality.
      • Develop reusable frameworks/components and Proof-of-Concepts required to accelerate the development process.
      • Take end to end technical ownership of modules, develop and deliver production code.
      Timings :
      Regular Shift
      Location :
      Madhapur, Hyderabad

  • #2 Full-stack developer
      Job Description
      We are looking for Full stack developers who are experts in software development, algorithm skills, and object-oriented things. We are looking for the developers who are very passionate to identify and solve the problem with creative and simple solutions.

      Prerequsite Requirment
      • Strong proficiency in Javascript, NodeJS, and ReactJS frameworks.
      • 1-2 years experience in Node js, react js, javascript
      • Hands-on experience with dev-ops like grunt, gulp, and Jenkins, etc.
      • Thorough knowledge of software development best practices, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build process, continuous integration and continuous delivery.

      Your role entitle
      • Understanding design principles and detailed knowledge of database architectures
      • Designing tools for systems to meet business needs
      • Contributes to best practice system and application design
      • Designing, coding, and testing programs and scripts from the agreed specification
      • Ensuring agreed standards and tools are in place to achieve a well-engineered product
      • Conducting releases to production environments and setting up post-release reviews
      • Analyzing release components
      • Takes part in reviewing own work and leads reviews of colleagueâs work (unit testing, code review)
      • Contributing ideas and experience to new development solutions
      • Provide support in development processes and techniques
      • Developing specialist knowledge of database concepts and data modeling techniques.
      • Analyzing data requirements to establish, adapt and maintain data models.
      • Close cooperation with the development team and business to carry out builds and testing
      Timings :
      Regular Shift

      Madhapur, Hyderabad

  • #4 Devops developer
      Job Description
      We are looking for a hands-on DevOps Engineer who will lead the way for our DevOps environment. The ideal engineer will bring their experiences, best practices, and a collaborative attitude to help drive DevOps initiatives. To be successful, one must effectively communicate with our development and operations team to orchestrate the creation of solutions that can scale.

      Prerequsite Requirment
      • Bachelorâs or Master's degree in Computer Science
      • Understanding of system administration in Linux environments
      • Strong knowledge of configuration management tools
      • Familiarity with continuous integration tools such as Jenkins, Travis CI, Circle CI
      • Proficiency in scripting languages including Bash, Python, and JavaScript
      • Strong communication and documentation skills
      • An ability to drive to goals and milestones while valuing and maintaining strong attention to detail
      • Excellent judgment, analytical thinking, and problem-solving skills
      • Full understanding of software development lifecycle best practices

      Your role entitle
      • Build and test code continuously with scripting and programming languages
      • Manage, track and document changes to code with source control tools
      • Deploy applications via automation with configuration management tools
      • Measure performance and environment of application with system & application log tools
      • Deploy and maintain critical applications on cloud-native microservices architecture
      • Implement automation, effective monitoring, and infrastructure-as-code
      • Deploy and maintain CI/CD pipelines across multiple environments
      • Support and work alongside a cross-functional engineering team on the latest technologies
      • Iterate on best practices to increase the quality & velocity of deployments
      • Sustain and improve the process of knowledge sharing throughout the engineering team
      • Have on-call responsibilities in rotation with the engineering team

      Regular Shift

  • #5 Frontend developer
      Job Description
      We are looking for passionate React developers who understand the intricacies and insanity of cross-browser development. People who are capable and willing to play a key part in shaping the future of Agile software development.

      Prerequsite Requirment
      • 2+ years of experience developing modular front-end components using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, JSON, and microformats.
      • Good familiarity with Redux pattern
      • Good Understanding of VCS like (git, mercurial)
      • Understanding of the difference between an interface, a class, and an object and comprehension of cascaded inheritance, prototype-based inheritance, etc.
      • Create good abstractions that actually get reused.
      • Solid understanding of user-centered design principles If this sounds like the sort of thing you are looking for, we should be talking.

      Your role entitle
      • Work with all kinds of crazy developers, and demanding clients to design and build new features.
      • Pairing with UX designers to build out design concepts and interactive prototypes
      • Pairing with developers to ensure that the presentation layer is implemented in accordance with best above best practices and UX specifications
      • Write good JavaScript code from scratch.
      • Produce clean, semantic HTML and CSS agonizing along the way for pixel perfection. Ensure cross-browser compatibility.
      • Make things shrink, twist, rotate, run across the page, and fade (tastefully).
      • Build simple, blindingly simple interfaces and believe that writing maintainable CSS goes beyond good class names.
      • Believe that disabled and visually challenged users have a right to use the web as easily as everyone else.
      Timings :
      Regular Shift
      Location :
      Madhapur, Hyderabad
      Apply Via :
      LinkedInÂ  |Â  Indeed
